doc:
renders text in a cell like from which it is derived. But while offers a simple entry to edit the text, offers a widget. Of course, that means that the text has to be parseable as a floating point number.

The range of the spinbutton is taken from the adjustment property of the cell renderer, which can be set explicitly or mapped to a column in the tree model, like all properties of cell renders. also has properties for the and the number of to display. Other properties can be set in a handler for the signal.

The cell renderer was added in GTK+ 2.10.
name: CellRendererSpin

properties.doc: The adjustment that holds the value of the spinbutton. This must be non-null for the cell renderer to be editable.
properties.name: adjustment

properties.doc: The acceleration rate when you hold down a button.
properties.name: climb-rate

properties.doc: The number of decimal places to display.
properties.name: digits
